attributes.action: Tell the Eurpoean Union to get back in its box.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are enraged to read that the EU is apparently poised to introduce legislation to do away with the “sexist” terms of “Mrs” and ”Miss”.  

We urge the Prime Minister to tell them to get back in their box and stop interfering with our cultural idiosyncrasies; our language, our miles, our pounds and ounces, our bent bananas, or any other such domestic matters should be left for us to decide.

rejection.details: The EU has published guidelines on the use of "Mrs" and "Miss" and their equivalents in other countries within the European Parliament only. The booklet - which is a voluntary guide, not legislation - will apply in the parliament, not to the European population at large.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
